name: Crocodile Solutions Software
tag_list: case-management-software, case-management, law-software, consultants, ssd, disability, social-security-disability, documentation-management-software, law-practice-software, documents-management-software, web-based-software, cloud-based-software
overview:
Crocodile Solutions offers law firms case & practice management software as well as management consulting services in marketing, advertising, financial analysis, and administration.

As demand for the company’s software applications grew, they began to concentrate on additional products to assist law firms to become more productive and profitable. In November 2010 they launched the “Crocodile Handshake” to transfer leads from various lead providers directly into Disability Specialist®This was followed by the launch of the first Software-as-a-Service SSD application, called DS Wings®, in June 2011.

Crocodile’s clients benefit from a company that combines the services of experienced law office consultants with the opportunity to adopt powerful software tools to help manage their law offices. Additionally, due to Crocodile’s legal background, they understand the confidentiality needs of law firms and see the benefit of developing and maintaining their software programs entirely in-house by utilizing their own software developers and technical staff.
